title: WATCH LIVE | Angelo Agrizzi returns to state capture commission
text:
WATCH LIVE | Angelo Agrizzi returns to state capture commission

09 October, 11:03 AM

Former Bosasa COO Angelo Agrizzi is expected to be cross-examined at the state capture commission of inquiry on Wednesday morning.

This comes after Armaments Corporation of South Africa CEO Kevin Wakeford, who was among those implicated as having benefited from Bosasa, was granted permission to cross-examine him and the company's former head of central business, Frans Vorster.

Senior ANC and former government officials were also not spared by Agrizzi during his testimony. Among those Agrizzi implicated were ANC chairperson and Minister of Mineral Resources and Energy Gwede Mantashe, former minister Nomvula Mokonyane, former president Jacob Zuma's ally Dudu Myeni, politicians and unnamed journalists.

Live stream courtesy of SABCnews.com
description: Former Bosasa COO Angelo Agrizzi is expected to be cross-examined at the state capture commission of inquiry. Watch live.
